resources.string: This Application is made for searching Sahaja Yoga Meditation Centers in India.

Application version Provides following facilities:

 1. Search centers by Single Keyword.

 2. Search centers by Region.

 3. By single click you will get map of particular center address.

 4. Add center reminder to Calendar.

 5. Add new center to Server Database.

 6. Edit/Update Public Program information to server Database.

 7. Edit/Update center information to Server Database.

 8. Save and Delete Center Lists for Offline Use.

 9. Share Center info by many Options like Mail, SMS.

 10. Also you can close center by informing to Administrator.
For any suggestions and feedbacks please mail us at email:\n sahaja.puneys@gmail.com
Delete old center lists to get new center data.
